item.title: Tex2Rmd--A package I developed in C++ and Java to covert Latex document to R markdown
item.description: A software package I developed in C++ and Java that converts a Latex document to the Rmarkdown format. The converted markdown document, possibly after further addition of other features and edits, can be converted to the html and word formats using R package knitr. For details how to use and where to get it, follow this link: Tex2Rmd and for a short guide here Tex2Rmd-a short guide
